newsitem.title: NORWAY: Statoil hits record at Kollsnes gas plant.
newsitem.headline: Statoil hits record at Kollsnes gas plant.

text.p: A new daily production record of 49.9 million cubic metres was set by the Troll gas treatment plant at Kollsnes outside Bergen on February 17-18, operator Den norske stats oljeselskal AS said on Thursday.
Statoil said that since the North Sea Ekofisk oilfield had experienced production problems this year, the company had been permitted to deliver more gas than before.
It said a number of bottlenecks in the pipelines also had been eliminated to raise delivery capacity to 50 million cubic metres.
Average daily deliveries from Kollsnes were around 43 to 44 million cubic metres.
